Sample RST Document with Images
================================

This is a sample reStructuredText document that includes images.

Basic Image
-----------

Here is a basic image:

.. image:: images/logo.png
   :alt: Company Logo
   :width: 200px

The image above should be converted to Markdown format.

Figure with Caption
-------------------

You can also use the figure directive:

.. figure:: diagrams/architecture.svg
   :alt: System Architecture
   :width: 500px
   :align: center

   This is the caption for the figure.

Multiple Images
---------------

Here are multiple images in sequence:

.. image:: screenshots/screen1.png
   :alt: First screenshot

Some text between images.

.. image:: screenshots/screen2.png
   :alt: Second screenshot

Conclusion
----------

All images should be properly converted to Markdown syntax.
